Through my eyes - Explore with me...

The cutest cafe in London!

When in London and you want a cafe that satifies your cakey needs and floral obsession, check out the cutest cafe i have come across - Elan cafe. Easily accessible and open until midnight, its the perfect spot to grab a drink or have your girly catch ups!
